title: Rani Haar Set with Peacock Pendant & Matching Jhumkas
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: This exquisite set showcases a contemporary take on the classic Rani Haar. The necklace features an intricate pattern of simulated diamonds, interspersed with ruby red and emerald green stones. The striking peacock pendant adds a touch of traditional elegance, meticulously crafted. The jhumkas mirror the necklace's design, creating a cohesive and graceful look. Pearl drops enhance the overall charm.
occasions: or any grand celebration where you want to make a lasting impression. Ideal for traditional occasions like Muhurtham
or even a modern cocktail party.
description: This set offers a stunning blend of traditional South Indian design and contemporary aesthetics. The high-quality simulated diamonds provide exceptional sparkle, while the Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting beauty. The peacock pendant adds cultural significance, symbolizing beauty, love, and prosperity. A timeless piece to treasure for generations.
